title: Dialogue-Based Digital Learning Design: Practical Development of Mathematics e-Learning Content

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Math e-learning content development process using conversation-based learning design tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can create math learning activity design documents using a dialogue-based authoring tool compliant with IMS LD standards.
Learners can implement at least three pedagogical support activities required for designing learner-system interaction.
Through generating and validating XML-based learning design files, learners can produce error-free UoL (Unit of Learning) packages.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
